title: Servers are being weird..
body: Just got kicked from a ranked game which is still in progress, will probably result in a queue time punishment due to a bad track record - but my net's fine and the other team's volibear is also not able to connect either. Pls no bannerino.

replies.body: Mine also just said "attempting to reconnect" forever while my net was working fine and then I exited to find I lost my ranked game, thus losing LP and getting no IP/Mastery/
Same here. Me and a friend just got kicked mid ranked game, we got a leaver report and lost LP. Please help, riot.
Sucks. Apparently I've lost 16 LP too, feelsbadman.
Just had the same as well and after trying to reconnect for ten minutes it has ended as a lost game for me. Great servers as always.
Hey, they're fantastic the majority of the time let's be real. Just the odd hiccup which needs to be addressed!

Don't know if you guys were here for it, but this isn't a first time thing.  I think sometime mid last year the same issue was happening, and somewhere or other there are certain ISPs that are not happy with league right now.  It'll definitely clear up within a couple days, but for now there's probably not much you can do about it.  Possibly affecting Internode, iinet, and adam internet, and maybe others.
